node.excerpt: I got around to adding the ability to use images in the my blog posts. To do this with Gatsby I had to install a Gatsby plugin and it defaults to having the image expand to fill the entire width of the page up to 650px. This is fine for now, at some…

Recently I've been working on a new project. I want to build a custom diy eurorack synthesizer. It will be a modular synthesizer with 3.5mm cables patching different inputs and outputs between modules. Eventually, I will need to build VCOs, VCAs…

I meant to write this post on Monday, which was my new deadline for finishing the version of my personel website I've been working on. The new website went up this past Saturday and I was working out small bugs and spelling errors through Sunday…

Unfortunately I didn't finish my personal website by the 25th which was the original deadline. I anticipated getting more done last weekend, but I ended up doing more errands and being a bit lazier than expected.  As a result the new deadline is this…

This will just be a quick update on my personal website rebuild progress.  Just before writing this I solved an issue with Bootstrap (my CSS library) and Gatsby (my static site generator). Gatsby has a development server that lets you see the client…
